source.title: Eldervale Seed Story
source.text: Deep within the mist‑soaked kingdom of Eldervale, a young mage named Liora discovered a silver seed glowing at the heart of an abandoned forest temple. Legends whispered that such seeds held the last remnants of ancient star‑spirits, long thought lost to time. When Liora touched it, the seed burst into swirling constellations that wrapped around her like living light, revealing a hidden path through the trees. Drawn forward, she followed the shimmering trail to a forgotten citadel suspended in the sky, its towers humming with dormant magic. As she stepped inside, the constellations settled into her palms, forming runes that pulsed with power—signaling that she had been chosen to awaken the citadel and restore the balance between the mortal world and the fading realm of stars.
